name: paraglider
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who jumps out of an aircraft with a special parachute that allows them to travel a long horizontal distance before they land: A paraglider died after hitting a crag and plummeting to the ground.
a special parachute that allows you to travel a long horizontal distance before you land: He took off from the field in a paraglider.
More examplesFewer examplesA strong wind can easily send a paraglider out of control.In 1994, a naked paraglider landed on the roof of the Palace.The world record for flying a paraglider is more than 460km.The pilot is suspended from the paraglider by strong lines and clipped into a harness in a sitting position.
